channel.title: [508] adding a custom spell [508]
channel.description: i made a quest called the last stand and when you finish you have access to the last stand spell witch when you cast this spell ir brings your hp to 20 but give your dharoks effect but lowers your defence by 10 lvl's for 10 seconds. its kinda cool cause it will make pking more instresting so if you would like help "credits" please help me
